title: The Gay Icon Contemporary Short Stories
description: This collection of Icon Contemporary Short Stories is a series of male experiences to varying degrees of depth. It looks at the gay experience with modern day living for most of us and it connects us with a certain understanding of the human heart.Please note, that some of these stories are in other eBook collections.Table of Introduction2) The Difference Between Buddies And Lovers3) The Stones On The Floor4) The E-Mail Message5) The Measure Of Love6) Oh Shit7) The Abyss8) The Understanding9) Earl's Child10) The Wrong Voice Far Away 11) The Thin Line
author: Robert Joseph Greene
